title: Library of Data Structures
description: A repository of a wide range of data structures and algorithms

title: MU Previous Year Papers
description: A website for MU students to access all the past exam papers for preperation.

title: Seismic damage assessment of buildings
description: Frontend implementation of a program that simulates the effects on a building due to seismic activity.

description: Parallelizing algorithms utilizing the GPU, powered by CUDA.

description: Repository containing non-linear approximation techniques discussed at undergrad level.

title: RAFT Consensus Algorithm (Implementation)
description: Implementation of Consensus Algorithm developed Diego Ongaro and John Ousterhout (Stanford. 2013)
